name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 8+ years of extensive experience in software development, I excel in designing and implementing modern, high-performance solutions using **Golang**, **Node.js**, and **TypeScript**. I possess a strong proficiency in building and optimizing microservices architectures and REST/gRPC APIs, ensuring scalable and robust applications. My technical toolkit includes **Redis**, **ClickHouse**, and **MongoDB** for efficient data storage and retrieval, while I'm adept at deploying and managing applications using **Docker** and **Kubernetes**. Additionally, I utilize **GitHub Actions** for CI/CD pipelines and monitor application performance with tools such as **Prometheus** and **Grafana**. My foundational skills in **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask), **PostgreSQL**, and various frontend frameworks like **Vue3** complement my ability to deliver comprehensive solutions across diverse sectors, including e-commerce and healthcare. I am committed to leveraging industry best practices to provide secure and reliable technology solutions.
